title: A beautiful 4+ bedroom apartment for rent
map_address: 835 Montello St Brockton MA near nelson St
posting_body: A very nice large 4 bedrooms apartment in a house on the scond floor meets everything your family needs.
Beautiful hardwood floor through the entire unit.
the second living room can be used as fifth bedroom if you need.
A big size (about 222 sf) kitchen has
eating in area for your family.
the bathroom has clean tile floor and white wall tiles up to the ceiling in the shower area.
four decent size bedrooms all with closets.
The whole apartment is just freshly painted recently.
there are two assigned parking spots for the apartment.
Commuter rail station is only a few blocks away from the apartmet.
The Westgate shopping center is not far and it is very easy to access highway. .
The apartment will be available on July 15,2022.
Open house Thursday July 14 between 3 to 6 pm , Friday July 15 between 3 to 6pm, Saturday July 16 between 11 to 5pm.
Or Text, email or call (prefer text) to schedule a showing.
